medford.name: Medford Oregon Temple
medford.ordinanceNotes: To schedule living ordinances (such as own endowment or sealing) or group visits, please call: (1) 541-664-2050
medford.additional: Family Ordinance Cards Ordinances for family names must be done in proper sequence—baptism, confirmation, Melchizedek Priesthood ordination (males), initiatory, endowment, and then sealing. Please allow sufficient time to perform all the ordinances you wish to complete during your visit. For additional help and information, please call the temple.
